description: GlobalControl is a website that uses a JavaScript Data Visualization library (d3.js) to visualize the top 50 super-connected companies in the world.
README.rdoc:
== README

GlobalControl is a website that uses a JavaScript Data Visualization library (d3.js) to visualize the top 50 super-connected companies in the world. Their ranking is based on an analysis by 3 Swiss system theorists. (http://arxiv.org/PS_cache/arxiv/pdf/1107/1107.5728v2.pdf)


* Ruby version
Ruby 2.0.0p481 (2014-05-08 revision 45883)

* System dependencies
Outside of the normal rails gems:
gem 'foundation-rails'
gem 'd3_rails'

* Database creation
No database creation. Site is implementing pre-loaded json files.
